name: @tagconcierge/consent-banner
description: A zero-dependency, lightweight (~3kB), consent platform agnostic, cookie banner for any website.

scripts.build: rimraf dist; esbuild src/app.js --outfile=dist/consent-banner-js/$npm_package_version/cb.min.js --bundle  --target=es6 --minify; mkdir -p dist/consent-banner-js/$npm_package_version/styles; uglifycss styles/light.css > dist/consent-banner-js/$npm_package_version/styles/light.min.css; node bundle.js; esbuild dist/bundle.js --outfile=dist/consent-banner-js/$npm_package_version/cb.bundle.min.js --bundle  --target=es6 --minify
